tweets.text:
This can't be allowed to continue. @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @PHE_uk act now before something tragic happens. @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off 
Residents of Staffordshire village launch fightback against a landfill https://t.co/KhufDwdaX2 via @MailOnline

urls.title: Residents of Staffordshire village launch fightback against a landfill
urls.description: A stinking landfill is causing misery among locals as the Environment Agency said hydrogen sulphide levels recorded at the site exceeded World Health Organisation guidelines.

tweets.text: @AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency The EA would respond as an emergency to this many complaints of flood water invading homes. What on earth does it take to have this viewed as an emergency?

Aware of houses in the following areas that had the fumes in the house for the first time on Fri/Sat: Maybank, Seabridge,Keele. 
This is out of control @MPGeorgeEustice @DefraGovUK . @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency is out of her depth big time #stopthestink @Cap_it_off @PHE_EoEngland

The #Environmental #Impact of the #BuiltEnvironment has no bounds. 
Digging up #Clay from elsewhere destroying #Habitat elsewhere for #FloodBanks 
When all the @EnvAgencyYNE needs to do is #SlowTheFlow of #Development to prevent #Flooding #ClimateChange in the first place.

The @EnvAgency calculate that Affinity Water are over abstracting local chalk streams to the tune of about 430 million litres of water per day.

That's almost 10% of the world's total supply of chalk streams degraded for profit.

Let's talk about a clean conscience shall we. https://t.co/J8nQmVNWlv
@YNET4 Interesting to hear #CliftonIngs #FloodDefences are delayed because they can't find the right kind of #Clay ....
Why aren‚Äôt you taking our suffering seriously, what will it take? Wealth should not be put before health @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids #stopthestink @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off

Why is the community having to do this? It is not right. Breathing fresh air is a #HumanRightsViolations @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids  @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @MattHancock @Sotlive #StopTheStink https://t.co/sZdDGUXRhu

tweets.text: 4 mths ago the Stink visited us for the 1st time. 3 mths ago I rang @EnvAgency angry that I couldnt open windows at night. 2 mths ago my calls were about solid walls of gas outside my home. 1 mth ago calls to @EnvAgency were about smarting eyes, headaches, AND NOW I JUST WEEP.

@claredinnis I‚Äôm tweeting this message on behalf of a gassed out resident living by the landfill, ST5, you know the one you visited  recently.  ‚Å¶@BorisJohnson‚Å© ‚Å¶@PHE_uk‚Å© ‚Å¶@EnvAgency‚Å© ‚Å¶@EnvAgencyMids‚Å© ‚Å¶@WHO‚Å© #stopthestink https://t.co/iI57bmmAYy

As part of their campaign, @StinkStopthe are also raising money to buy air purifiers (among other things) for people in the local community who are suffering from dangerously poor air quality. Again, if you can, please consider donating money to the cause: https://t.co/47SlE4DcAp

A harrowing account of the impact of #WalleysQuarry landfill on a local resident. Will someone please help us to #StopTheStink, as @EnvAgencyMids are not fit for purpose. Their email for reporting is currently down, on what's been the stinkiest weekend of the year so far! https://t.co/bc4YYdJDMg

tweets.text: @EnvAgency @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA this is bloody ridiculous we have a full on gas onslaught again tonight from @WalleysL got serious heart palpitations again & a blinding headache. Do you care? Do you bugger üò°. Happy Mayday as it won't be for us. #StopTheStink @Cap_it_off

And @PHE_EoEngland I blame Public Health @StaffordshireCC a LOT for failing to protect our health. It‚Äôs unforgivable & they will be held accountable as will @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/nhviObi7eM

Thank you to the Daily Mail for honestly representing the ongoing environmental disaster while the @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice stand back&watch our children be poisoned every night.Which one will end up in the dock? @Cap_it_off #stopthestink https://t.co/tdrCbx614Z

@tayz_BETH @scottdegg @EnvAgency We ve even ringing for 20 years, had a few years off after they were taken to court by some residents, I wasntincolved but the outcome was no stink for a long time, since @RedIndustries2 took over its been horrendous & far worse than Lafarge #stopthestink

@davemh72 @MPGeorgeEustice @EnvAgency @BorisJohnson @StinkStopthe @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids @Cap_it_off The waiting time was longer I believe as the email system was down. Even complaining retrospectively will help the cause. Have never known it affect such a widespread area as reports @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

Because that‚Äôs what @essex_cc and the @EnvAgency are allowing to happen right now
@WHO it‚Äôs time you get involved there measuring out in fresh air we‚Äôre been gassed in our homes what are the levels there? #StopTheStink @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe https://t.co/Y68HDYkHr4

I'm confident you were waiting on my update @ClareDinnisEA as you said you were concerned about residents breathing in toxic gas, it has now enveloped the entire 1st floor of the house, the main bathroom upstairs reeks and the back bedrooms are unbearable, we can't breath in NUL!

@SuzVW @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA A message for the EA & PHE, we the communities of the borough Newcastle under Lyme  say NO to the acceptance of LFG in our homes, gardens, schools,  workplaces and everyday activities & way of life!
So go to the government and declare it a critical risk to health & get it sorted! https://t.co/CPE60J60V3

Thank you @DailyMailUK
for an indepth & frank account of life in N-u-L living with toxic landfill gases from @RedIndustries2  We extend our sincere apologies to your poor reporters and photographers who had to put up with the awful stench
@StinkStopthe 

https://t.co/uL5Ofvfjbn

Either we are being invaded by landfill gases or we are fighting against them. And all around work & families. It‚Äôs tiring & we need it to stop @MPGeorgeEustice It‚Äôs your job to hold the @EnvAgency to account, please get this sorted @BorisJohnson @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/CE11jwtP8y

tweets.text: @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 You don't have to live with this smell as we do. Our health is suffering. I only have one lung and COPD my life is a misery. Close it down now

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Put lives before profits shut that place down otherwise shut the town down, pay us proper rates for our unsaleable homes & rename it Chernobyl 2 #stopthestink
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 Coward. !!
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 You have failed us. We don‚Äôt want you to work with @RedIndustries2 we want you to close it down. #StopTheStink #LandfillStillStinks #WalleysQuarry

@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @RedIndustries2 If a restaurant served bad food and poisoned people environmental Heath would close them down straight away . This is an environment disaster why are you pussy footing around this . You have the evidence!

tweets.text: https://t.co/9vKapgSGUn tell people to email and then the email suddenly doesn't work.Something doesn't quite add up.A little like not having the monitoring stations plugged in on one of the worst weekends @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids #StopTheStink #notfitforpurpose @StinkStopthe https://t.co/qXVbNru1va

We have VERY little research into low level, long term exposure to hydrogen sulphide in the UK, yet @EnvAgency and @PHE_uk seem to want to assure us we are not at risk... please do not make false statements. More research is required https://t.co/UMoaVNnhTe

@SianieRoo @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @MattHancock @BorisJohnson Same, 9 tonight @AaronBell4NUL the EA response was inadequate now we need ministerial response from govt to put our health before permit breaching operators profits. #stopthestink

tweets.text: @SianieRoo @scottdegg @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @ClareDInnisEA what have you done to ensure the massive gassing of 1000s of residents doesn't happen tonight, if nothing then evacuate us now, allowing humans to to be poisoned by toxic gas will never be acceptable & you will be held to account. #stopthestink

@AaronBell4NUL @EnvAgency Daughter had massive nosebleed in the night, able to clear house at 06.30, but it‚Äôs back now. What the hell are they doing at night? Do they just not care or is it truly out of control? Gov need to step in now. They could stop this immediately. #stopthestink @BorisJohnson

tweets.text: Dr. Neil Carman, published a study (2001) that concluded growing children are more vulnerable to hydrogen sulphide because they breathe more rapidly, taking in significantly more pollution than adults. @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe over 30 mins at 5 ppb INDOORS.

@MPGeorgeEustice can you explain why the @EnvAgency extended the landfill despite concerns raised over fumes? Or why they allowed municipal waste to be added to the permit despite concerns raised? If you don‚Äôt know the answers FIND OUT! @BorisJohnson @ClareDinnisEA #stopthestink https://t.co/nO8xC2hh51
